subject: Create command file `.claude/commands/lisa/learn.md`
description:
**Type:** Task

**Description:** Create `.claude/commands/lisa/learn.md` following the exact pattern from `.claude/commands/lisa/integration-test.md`. The command is a thin wrapper that delegates to `/lisa-learn` skill.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] `.claude/commands/lisa/learn.md` created with correct frontmatter and body
- [ ] File follows same format as `integration-test.md` and `review-project.md`
- [ ] NOT placed in `all/copy-overwrite/` (Lisa-only)

**Skills to Invoke:** `/coding-philosophy`, `/jsdoc-best-practices`

**Verification:**
- Type: manual-check
- Command: `cat .claude/commands/lisa/learn.md`
- Expected: YAML frontmatter with description, allowed-tools: [Skill], argument-hint; body delegates to /lisa-learn skill with $ARGUMENTS

verification.expected: YAML frontmatter with description, allowed-tools: [Skill], argument-hint; body delegates to /lisa-learn skill with $ARGUMENTS
